entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI District 2002. Evaluation of the mayors office in the 18th district of Budapest in the local adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F23: TÁRKI District 2002. Evaluation of the mayors office in the 18th district of Budapest in the local adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Gazsó, Tibor
entry.dcterms:description: primary and secondary party preferences, evaluating the suitability of Prime Minister candidates, subjective financial situation, satisfaction with the work of the government and opposition, political self-categorization, reputation and evaluation of the work of the 18th district self-government in Budapest, political activity, how widely are the district newspapers read
entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
economic conditions and indicators
person
survey data
cross-section

Two-stage random sample. Considering the population density of the district 34 starting points were deifned for the random walking sampling, the concret individuals were selected using the Leslie Kish-key.
face-to-face interview
D
